original_title: Casos de Adolescentes: O Nerd, o Bruto e a Roqueira
overview: The last entry in the web-series 'Cases of Teens' focuses on three young people quite different from each other. Cristovão, Daniel and Francisca, come across a vengeful confrontation that may question their own personalities, and twist the teenage clichés.
tagline: All this for a fistful of teenagers
title: Cases of Teens: The Nerd, the Brute and the Rocker
